explains: adj. 棘手的；难治的；倔强的；不听话的

sentences.en: The economy still faces intractable problems.
sentences.cn: 经济依然面临一些棘手的问题。

sentences.en: What may be done to reduce the influence of intractable opponents?
sentences.cn: 可以做些什么来削弱难以对付的对手们的影响呢？

sentences.en: All these problems are fiendishly intractable.
sentences.cn: 所有这些问题都非常棘手。
